name: Simple Image watermark
author: Amir Ahmic

sections.description:
This plugin allowes you to add watermark to your images “on the fly”.
Watermark was added while image is uploaded.
You can choose image sizes on which watermark will be apllied.

Configuration is simple:

  • choose image sizes
  • upload watermark
  • choose watermark position
  • enter margins for best positioning

If any questions visit plugin homepage

Website

http://www.2klabs.com/

Documentation

http://www.2klabs.com/siw
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘simple-image-watermark’ directory to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to ‘Settings -> Watermark options’ in WordPress menu to configure plugin
sections.faq:
Plugin doesn’t work for you

Visit plugin hompage and post your or check others comments

Error message says that I don’t have GD extension installed

Contact your hosting provider and ask them to enable GD extension for your host, because without GD extension you won’t be able to watermark your images.
